page.title: 06KILBURN(DERBY)AREA LIFESTYLE
page.content: The nearest centres of public entertainment are Derby and Nottingham, but only a small proportion of our area's population visit these centres' theatres, cinemas or concert_halls, partly due to the preference for television and videos, a development which brought about the closure of the local cinemas in Belper, Ripley and Heanor. Families going out in the evenings are more likely to go to the local Miners' Welfare or other social club, or just to an ordinary public house. Watching or playing sports of various sorts has increased in popularity (see separate pages on{Belper Sports Centre}). The young are attrated to youth clubs and discos provided in the area.
